mapper.insert: insert into members (members_id, members_name, members_password, members_city, members_street, members_zipcode) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{passWord}, #{address.city}, #{address.street}, #{address.zipcode})
mapper.select: select members_id as id, members_name as name, members_password as passWord, members_city as city, members_street as street, members_zipcode as zipcode from members where members_id=#{id}
